inclusion.criterion: Able to understand the information given
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No lesions or wounds in the areas where acupressure was to be applied
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Operated on under general anaesthesia pulse, blood pressure, body temperature and oxygen saturation values within normal range during the operation
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: pulse, blood pressure, body temperature and oxygen saturation values within normal range

inclusion.criterion: No failure or disorder developing intraoperatively or postoperatively related to fluid-electrolyte balance, acid-base balance, or tissue perfusion.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: American Society of Anaesthesiologists (ASA) physical status IV
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: A requirement for simultaneous combined surgery,
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: A need for postoperative fasting according to the preoperative evaluation or intraoperative findings (eg, panperitonitis with intraperitoneal abscess)
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of panperitonitis or intraperitoneal abscess

exclusion.criterion: A history of syncope or seizures
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of syncope or seizures

exclusion.criterion: The presence of any disease related to bleeding or a clotting disorder
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who were unwilling to participate in the research.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has abdominal pain lasting about 4 days accompanied by nausea and 2 episodes of vomiting. She has several gallstones and biliary sludge, and surgery consultation recommends elective cholecystectomy.
